item.title: “men of good will” and other changes
item.description:
Gloria in excelsis Deo. Et in terra pax hominibus bonae voluntatis. The English version of the Roman Catholic Missal changed at the start of Advent. The new translation is truer to the Latin original.
The response to “The Lord be with you,” change to “And with your spirit” from “and also with you.” The Latin, et cum spiritu tuo translates exactly into “and with your spirit.” Another change that thrills conservative Catholics, is the consecration.
